description: Use this job when you want to cluster a set of documents and attach cluster labels based on topics.

clusterIdField.description: Output field name for unique cluster id.
clusterIdField.title: Output Field Name for Cluster Id

clusterLabelField.description: Output field name for top frequent terms that are (mostly) unique for each cluster.
clusterLabelField.title: Detected Cluster Keywords Field Name

clusteringMethod.description: Choose between hierarchical vs kmeans clustering.
clusteringMethod.title: Clustering Method (hierarchical or kmeans)

dataFormat.description: Spark-compatible format which training data comes in (like 'solr', 'hdfs', 'file', 'parquet' etc)
dataFormat.title: Data format

distToCenterField.description: Output field name for doc distance to its corresponding cluster center (measure how representative the doc is).
distToCenterField.title: Output Field Name for doc distance to its cluster center

docLenTrim.description: Whether to separate out docs with extreme lengths.
docLenTrim.title: Find Extreme Length Doc Flag

fieldToVectorize.description: Solr field containing text training data. Data from multiple fields with different weights can be combined by specifying them as field1:weight1,field2:weight2 etc.
fieldToVectorize.title: Field to Vectorize

freqTermField.description: Output field name for top frequent terms in each cluster. These may overlap with other clusters.
freqTermField.title: Top Frequent Terms Field Name

id.description: The ID for this Spark job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_). Maximum length: 63 characters.
id.title: Spark Job ID

kDiscount.description: Applies a discount to help favor large/small K (number of clusters). A smaller value pushes K to assume a higher value within the [min, max] K range.
kDiscount.title: Discount for K when choosing number of clusters

longLen.description: Length threshold to define long document. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
longLen.title: Length Threshold for Long Doc

maxDF.description: Max number of documents the term can show up. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
maxDF.title: Max Doc Support

minDF.description: Min number of documents the term has to show up. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
minDF.title: Min Doc Support

minDivisibleSize.description: Clusters must have at least this many documents to be split further. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
minDivisibleSize.title: Minimum divisible cluster size

modelId.description: Identifier for the model to be trained; uses the supplied Spark Job ID if not provided.
modelId.title: Model ID

norm.description: p-norm to normalize vectors with (choose -1 to turn normalization off)
norm.title: Vector normalization

numKeywordsPerLabel.description: Number of Keywords needed for labeling each cluster.
numKeywordsPerLabel.title: Number of Keywords for Each Cluster

outlierK.description: Number of clusters to help find outliers.
outlierK.title: Number of outlier groups

outlierThreshold.description: Identify as outlier group if less than this percent of total documents. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
outlierThreshold.title: Outlier cutoff

outputCollection.description: Solr Collection to store model-labeled data to
outputCollection.title: Output Collection

randomSeed.description: For any deterministic pseudorandom number generation
randomSeed.title: Random seed

shortLen.description: Length threshold to define short document. value<1.0 denotes a percentage, value=1.0 denotes 100%, value>1.0 denotes the exact number.
shortLen.title: Length Threshold for Short Doc

sourceFields.description: Solr fields to load (comma-delimited). Leave empty to allow the job to select the required fields to load at runtime.
sourceFields.title: Fields to Load

stopwordsList.description: Stopwords defined in Lucene analyzer config
stopwordsList.title: List of stopwords

trainingCollection.description: Solr Collection containing documents to be clustered
trainingCollection.title: Training Collection

trainingDataFilterQuery.description: Solr query to use when loading training data
trainingDataFilterQuery.title: Training data filter query

trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.description: Additional spark dataframe loading configuration options
trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.title: Dataframe Config Options

trainingDataSamplingFraction.description: Fraction of the training data to use
trainingDataSamplingFraction.title: Training data sampling fraction

uidField.description: Field containing the unique ID for each document.
uidField.title: ID Field Name

w2vDimension.description: Word-vector dimensionality to represent text (choose > 0 to use, suggested dimension ranges: 100~150)
w2vDimension.title: Word2Vec Dimension

w2vWindowSize.description: The window size (context words from [-window, window]) for word2vec
w2vWindowSize.title: Word2Vec Window Size

writeOptions.description: Options used when writing output to Solr.
writeOptions.title: Write Options

title: Document Clustering
